reviewText: Should watch all of the Nora Roberts movies that come on TV. They are really good!!
Excellent DVD  I am hoping to get all of Nora Roberts DVD's.  These are 2 of really great stories.  DVD great playing and in super condition.  Thank you.

I definitely wanted "Blue Smoke", and getting "Angels Fall", too, was a nice bonus.  The visuals were compelling, and the flash-backs in time were perfectly placed to keep the mood just as it was when I read the book.  Keep working with Nora!

Movies are both in great condition and play amazing Both have very good story lines and great to watch I enjoy reading any Nora Roberts books so I was excited to find movies that i enjoy because I love the books.
Love the movies.  Received quickly.
love the movie from Nora Roberts she has a book call The Lair she need to put out as a movie it a great book too
Was a good combo pack

I have seen Blue Smoke and it is great but have not as yet watched Angels Fall, but Heather Locklear is a great actrss.
Jolene Shelley
Great movies at a great price!
I like these kind of movies & I do enjoy them. It worth the money for me.
Great movie
Excellent!  Love Nora Roberts!!!!!
Really good dramatizations of 2 Nora Roberts books.  Actors all well-chosen and very good.
Thank's

I purchased this disk.  I read a lot of Nora Roberts books.  These two movies are from some of my favorites.  With this purchase, i am building my library.  I had no issues with the product when it arrived.  It was delivered on time and in the condition i expected.  The seller informed me of the progress of my order.  that it was received,  when shipment was made and expectation of arrival.  As I said it arrived on time.  No issues at all.  I would recommend this item to others and look forward to working with the seller in the future.
gave it away as a gift-didn't keep my interest. Person who got it wasn't thrilled with it either. Think it is a matter of taste.
I enjoyed Angels Fall more than I did Blue Smoke.  Angels Fall will keep you guessing about what is happening and why.  The other movie Blue Smoke was just ok, but still entertaining.
I would recommend this to anyone who likes Nora Roberts.  It was like reading the book all over again.  A must watch!
Nora Roberts is one of the best authors I have ever read. The movie matches the book to a T.
This is a great DVD.  I had movie day at my house and everyone really enjoyed this DVD and wanted to know were I bought it.

Angels Fall / Blue Smoke (2007) I love these Nora Roberts movies, and finding them in a 2 pack together saves me money and keeps them both together too. The video and audio quality is on par with other DVD movies. I have watched and own many movies like these. I enjoy movies with some drama and suspense and a love story to boot. If you have read and enjoyed books and/or movies by Nora Roberts and Danielle Steel, then you will probably enjoy these two movies very much.
Love to see watch these types of movies without commericals. Big fan of romance and its nice to see big name stars in these roles.
It was enjoyable to see the movies after reading the books. Great seller. Sent in timely manner. One of Nora Robert's great books put to movies.

The good news is that both of these movies adapted from Nora Roberts'  books stick reasonably well to the book plots.  The bad news is that the actors and actresses chosen for the roles could have been better.  Heather Locklear looked to be 45, rather than 25 like in the book.  Alicia Witt, whose name you have listed above, is the unknown actress who plays Katarina Hale in Blue Smoke. These DVD's are nevertheless keepers and I will watch them again.
I love Nora Roberts.  Read all her books.  Enjoy seeing them come to life on my TV.  Anyone who enjoys her books will enjoy the dvd.
I love all of the Nora Roberts movies. This was a great deal for 2 of the movies and they're both very good and suspenseful.
I loved the books, hated the movies. I know you ask for twenty words,but what else can I say if I had viewed the films first I wood have missed reading a couple of very enjoyable books
Both movies are full of action and entertainment.  A good way to get 2 movies for the price of one.  Recommend for a fun evening of viewing, but don't expect Academy Award performances.

I am a Nora Roberts junkie and have read every one of her books.  Angel Falls & Blue Smoke are 2 of her books that have been made in to movies.  I was entertained and enjoyed both movies but the reality is I don't think anyone could turn one of Nora's books into a 5 star movie in under 2 hours.  The movies were very good but at times the acting (especially in Blue Smoke) was just okay.

As a Nora Roberts addict I would still have watched the movies but they both left me wanting more.  I say read the books!
I love Nora Roberts books, so Needless to say the movies are not as good as the books, but they were very very good
These two movies are my favorite "Nora Roberts" movies...So naturally I bought these to share with one of my favorite people...my ceramics instructor and friend.

I had seen Angels Fall on TV and wanted to add it to my collection.  I enjoyed watching it again.  I like suspense films.  The added benefit was getting a second Nora Roberts movie with it that was good, too.  I was not disappointed at all.
DVD was in excellent shape and I totally enjoyed the movies. Nora Roberts books brought to movies ... AWESOME!!!!!
Great acting. Thank you.
I love these movies they write down time in perfect condition
Great movies but I'm partial to Nora Roberts.
good stories
this is two very good movie.
I haven't recueved this one
Love these movies based upon Nora Roberts' novels.  Even my husband, who hates to read, likes these movies!
action pack dvd
You want this in your library if you are a Nora fan but as with many other Nora video productions, both of these titles suffer from poor casting and PG-dumbed down sex.
Both good movies...low budget, but interesting movies.
